This block takes in an image and a caption.

The height of the image can be selected between: Full screen, Half, a Third or a Quarter

This block takes in repeating text sections. Each section has a Title (can be H1, H2 or H3) and Text fields. The text field can be set up to either one or two columns

Block: Fifty-fifty

This blocks presents images and text in a 2 column layout.

The content can be typed in, or multiple pages can be selected and the content will be automatically pulled from those pages. If multiple pages are selected the layout will alternate the image and text position on each row.

Main CTA Second CTA
Group Visits
Explore highlights of Hispanic Sociaty’s history, works on view, special exhibitions, and the Audubon Terrace variety of tours with Museum educators every  Friday and Saturday  at 2:00 p.m. Space is limited.  The supervision of one adult is required for every ten students. Teachers and chaperones are required to stay with their group at all times and are responsible for the students’ conduct and behavior. 
Read
Galleries
Explore highlights of Hispanic Sociaty’s history, works on view, special exhibitions, and the Audubon Terrace variety of tours with Museum educators
Read

Hours and Locations
The Museum and Library Reading Room are closed on all major holidays. Please consult the list of closures, below, before planning your visit.

Visitor Policies
Recording devices and music playing devices are prohibited. Visitors may not touch any of the objects on display, including furniture. No oversized items such as luggage or…

Block: Images gallery

This block shows a grid of images. When an image is clicked on, it opens a full-screen lightbox carousel with captions.

Block: Images tiles with links (asymmetric grid)

This block shows an asymetrical grid of images with a title and a link.

Each tile can be made from free form content, or can be pulled from another page of the site.
